0:
--------------------
Text: Zaynab (also spelled Zainab, Zeinab, Zinab, and in other ways; Arabic: زينب‎ ‎ , ] ) is a female given name meaning "a father's precious jewel", or "the adornment/beauty of the father".
Triplets:<Zaynab
1:
--------------------
Text: Zaynab (name):  It is derived from the Arabic root words "zeenah" Arabic: زينة‎ ‎ (meaning adornment, beauty) and "ab" Arabic: الآب‎ ‎ (meaning father).
Triplets:<Zaynab
2:
--------------------
<Text: Zaynab (name):  It can also mean "fragrant flower".>
Triplets:<Zaynab
3:
--------------------
Text: Zaynab (name):  It is also closely connected to the Hebrew name 'Zenyeb' (Zeyn-abi/Zeyn-aba) which means 'Pride of [her] father'.
Triplets:<Zaynab
